Subject: Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

---

Dear Valued Customer,

I hope this message finds you well! I’m Robert Simmons, your dedicated loyalty program manager here at Delphi's Delights. I’m reaching out to let you know that you have an exciting number of **3,250 rewards points** currently sitting in your account. However, please note, these points are scheduled to expire in just **3 short days**!

We don't want you to miss out on the chance to indulge in some of your favorite treats and beverages. Just imagine sipping on a cozy cup of **Dionysus' Divine Cocoa** or savoring the aromatic notes of **Hades' Dark Roast Coffee**—all thanks to the rewards you’ve earned. With your points, you could also enjoy the delicate flavors of **Aphrodite’s Rose Latte** and even have some points left over.

To make sure you can enjoy these flavorful experiences, I encourage you to log in to your account at the [Rewards Portal] and redeem your points today. It’s my pleasure to be your point of contact in ensuring you have the most delightful experiences with us.

Thank you for being such a loyal part of the Delphi's Delights community. Should you need any assistance, please feel free to reach out. I’m here to help!

Warm Regards,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi's Delights

--- 

Please don’t wait too long; I’d hate for these delightful opportunities to slip away without a chance for you to enjoy them. Enjoy your rewards, and we look forward to serving you soon!

**Subject:** Your Rewards Points are About to Expire!

Dear [Customer's Name],

Might I suggest the aromatic Hades' Dark Roast Coffee for a bold pick-me-up, the refreshing Persephone’s Pomegranate Tea for a fruity twist, or the indulgent Aphrodite’s Rose Latte for a floral delight.

To redeem your points and explore more delightful possibilities, simply click on the following link: [Rewards Portal]. With so many delicious options, there’s something for every taste, and I’m confident you’ll find something you love.

Thank you for being a valued member of our loyalty program. I look forward to seeing you soon at one of our stores!

Warm wishes,

Robert Simmons  
Loyalty Program Manager  
Delphi’s Delights
